featured.text: The students in Professor Smith’s classical Chinese class are required to _____

what happens on Earth, and are responsible for quite a few legends, and that the ancient Greek and Roman gods, __(34)__ the fairies and dwarfs in many classical tales, were in fact “space people” living here.

definition.zh_def: 古典的，傳統的，特別是指古代的藝術、文學或音樂。
definition.en_def: Relating to the ancient Greek or Roman world, or to the literature, art, and music of that period; also refers to traditional styles.
definition.example: She enjoys listening to classical music while studying.
